Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 81st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1969...
Drafted in 5th round, 82nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1969...
Injured on 4/12/1970 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from St. Louis to Cleveland on 1/31/1973 (Going to STL: 1B G. Ratliff. Going to CLE: 2B L. Milbourne, LF G. Burke, CF H. Cruz)...
Had first career hit on 7/31/1975, off Jim Slaton (CHW)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/5/1975, off Don Sutton (OAK)...
Injured on 6/15/1978 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Traded from Cleveland to Cincinnati on 6/23/1978 (Going to CIN: P B. Apodaca, 2B L. Milbourne. Going to CLE: 3B B. Marcano, RF A. James)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/16/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 2/20/1984 to a 3-year deal worth $1,080,000 per year...
